title: Brutalizer build options too limited
body:
With the Brutalizer taken out of the Black Cleaver (that's its own set of reasons), the item can be built into Youmuu's, or into Youmuu's, or Youmuu's.

I think this is against the Game's philosophy of choices, diversity, etc..   You are essentially on a permanent build path.  Never at any point can you take the item in a different direction.

Either just get rid of it and re-do the Youmuu's build, or add an item for it to build into.

All that said, I agree we need more brutalizer upgrades.

If you want to get technical Brutilizer does build into Warrior. Of coarse that only applies if your Jungling. 

It seems like riot does not do a lot with the in between items. to say Bruitalizer is too limited in it's build options is not exactly exclusive to that item. 

Take haunting guise for example. The Mpen is real good except that it only builds into Liliandry's torment. which most mages don't benefit enough from. 

But I digress, Riot probably intends for certain items to have limited build options. It probably works better for item balance if riot only uses the component items where they make sense to balance the final product. And the Final product is ultimately what everyone will strive for. If your can think of a good Final item, which building Bruitalizer makes sense in it's build path, let me know.

It was suggested a while back that brutalizer build into a stronger executioner's calling replacement, giving back access to grevious wounds for ad champs.  A rioter said it was a good idea, but so far, not even a whisper about it.

> [{quoted}](name=masterdragon481,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=X4IpuWnc,comment-id=00050001,timestamp=2015-06-12T18:02:55.002+0000)

When you say rioter, it could have been Meddler, or it could have been someone in a completely different department. Though I would think the ideas came about the rioters.

Items are probably more troublesome when trying to balance them. Because changing an item will completely change the viability of champions, or even change the Meta. I don't know if Riot had a problem with Executioner's calling, I would have felt that constant Grievous wounds have been problematic if the item worked as intended. 

If I were to try and Reintroduce that item. (and I only vaugly remember it) I would shift it more as an AD caster item. Because Abilities would probably give it bigger windows that on Auto Attack. (think AD Morello's)
Maybe a new TriForce-level item that builds out of Guise, Brutalizer, and Armguard? Obviously it'd be champs that can benefit from hybrid pen and a bit of armor. Just an idea.

Hybrid penetration items don't exist in the game, and are unlikely to ever exist in the game due to how efficient they would be.  The advantage of playing a hybrid damage champion is that you can tailor your offense around their defense; mindlessly getting penetration for both on a single item defeats that purpose.  

Not to say that it isn't a bad idea, but its been mentioned many times before and is unlikely to ever be implemented.

Funny thing is that they hold back the Abysall rework cause the reworked Abyssal fills a different niche and thus they don't change it till they have proper item to fill the current abysal niche.

However, new BC fills a different nich than old BC aswell, and the absence of the old BC leaves a huge gap for ad-caster itemization, yet apperantly no one cared about getting a new item to fill that nich befor pushing through the BC changes.

I think working brutalizer into Essence Reaver would be great, ER still is a rarly seen item that is a bit lacking. By giving it flat pane and therefor lowering the ad, it would be pushed even more towards ad-casters.

Old BC's niche was "tank buster squishy buster." It historically did it's job of "kill everything" really well, or really poorly, because of how tough it is to balance. That niche doesn't need refilling.
